授業目的: This course relativizes Japan to better understand its position in the contemporary world. Examining topical issues from the cultural and social to the economic and political, this course encourages students to take a fresh look at Japanese society through the lens of international comparison.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain a deeper and more critical understanding of contemporary Japan in light of current debates on culture, society, and politics around the world. They will also improve on their skills in argumentation, expository writing, and oral presentation.
授業方法: Small lectures, discussions, presentations, essays. Zooms lessons for students who have received permission to study online.
